Name: Luxury Mojito
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: MUDDLE mint in glass with sugar and lime juice. Fill glass with crushed ice, add rum, Angostura and champagne, then stir.
Review: A Mojito made with aged rum and topped with champagne instead of soda water: more complex than the original.
